name: Diagnostics of the state of aggression

questions.question: Sometimes I can't handle the urge to hurt others
Sometimes I gossip about people I don't like
I get annoyed easily, but I calm down quickly
If I'm not asked in a nice way, I won't do it
I don't always get what I'm supposed to
I do not know what people say about me behind my back
If I don't approve of my friends 'behavior, I let them feel it
When I happened to deceive someone, I experienced excruciating remorse
I don't think I can hit a person
I never get so annoyed that I throw objects
I am always forgiving of other people's shortcomings
If I don't like the established rule, I want to break it
Others are almost always able to take advantage of favorable circumstances
I am wary of people who treat me somewhat more amicably than I expect
I often disagree with people
Sometimes thoughts come to my mind that I'm ashamed of
If someone hits me first, I won't answer them
When I get annoyed, I slam doors
I'm much more irritable than I seem
If someone imagines themselves to be a boss, I always act against them
I'm a little sad about my fate
I think a lot of people don't like me
I can't resist arguing if people don't agree with me
People who shirk their jobs should feel guilty
Anyone who insults me and my family is asking for a fight
I 'm not capable of making rude joke
I get angry when someone mocks me
When people pretend to be superiors, I do everything possible so that they don't get conceited
Almost every week I see someone I don't like
Quite a few people are jealous of me
I demand that people respect me
It depresses me that I don't do enough for my parents
People who constantly harass you are worth being 'snapped on the nose'
I'm never gloomy with anger
If I'm treated worse than I deserve, I don't get upset
If someone pisses me off, I don't pay attention
Although I don't show it, I sometimes get jealous
Sometimes I feel like I'm being laughed at
Even if I'm angry, I don't use strong language
I want my sins to be forgiven
I rarely fight back, even if someone hits me
When it doesn't work out my way, I sometimes get offended
Sometimes people annoy me just by being there
There are no people I really hate
My principle: "Never trust strangers"
If someone annoys me, I'm ready to say what I think of them
I do a lot of things that I later regret
If I get angry, I can hit someone
I have never shown outbursts of anger since I was a child
I often feel like a powder keg about to explode
If everyone knew how I feel, I would be considered a person who is not easy to work with
I always think about what secret reasons make people do something nice for me
When someone yells at me, I start yelling back
Failures make me sad
I fight no less often and no more often than others
I can remember times when I was so angry that I would grab something that came to hand and break it
Sometimes I feel like I'm ready to start a fight first
Sometimes I feel that life treats me unfairly
I used to think that most people were telling the truth, but now I don't believe it
I only swear out of anger
When I do something wrong, my conscience torments me
If I need to use physical force to protect my rights, I will use it
Sometimes I express my anger by banging my fist on the table
I can be rude to people I don't like
I don't have any enemies who would want to hurt me
I don't know how to put a person in their place, even if they deserve it
I often think that I lived incorrectly
I know people who can bring me to fights
I don't get upset about small things
It rarely occurs to me that people are trying to anger or insult me
I often threaten people, although I don't intend to carry out threats
I've been getting boring lately
I often raise my voice in an argument
I usually try to hide my bad attitude towards people
I'd rather agree with something than argue
